snippet.title: Steampunk Graveyard - side scrolling 2D action platformer game for PC
snippet.description:
Steampunk Graveyard is a side scrolling 2D action platformer game for PC where nefarious Baron Richter von Sprocket has turned the dead into piston powered zombie automatons. It's up to his former protégé, Professor Selene Gasket, to put a stop to the menace and save the terrified villagers.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/956430/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/badlogicstudios
